user.title: Configure Tibber Hourly Insights
user.description: Enter your Tibber API token to access hourly electricity price data.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Tibber API
error.invalid_auth: Invalid API token. Please check your token and try again.

init.title: Configure Tibber Hourly Insights
init.description: Adjust weights and settings for the price consensus sensor. Weights will be automatically normalized to sum to 1.0.

data_description.weight_tibber: Weight for Tibber's API price level classification (0.0-1.0)
data_description.very_cheap_pct: Percentage value for VERY_CHEAP price level
data_description.cheap_pct: Percentage value for CHEAP price level
data_description.normal_pct: Percentage value for NORMAL price level (typically 0%)
data_description.expensive_pct: Percentage value for EXPENSIVE price level
data_description.very_expensive_pct: Percentage value for VERY_EXPENSIVE price level
data_description.enable_30d_baseline: WARNING: Queries recorder database hourly, may impact performance on low-end devices
data_description.enable_grid_fee: Add time-based grid fees to all price calculations. Subsidy is applied first, then grid fee is added.
data_description.grid_fee_day: Grid tariff during day hours (NOK/kWh). Norwegian standard: 0.444 NOK.
data_description.grid_fee_night: Grid tariff during night hours (NOK/kWh). Norwegian standard: 0.305 NOK.
data_description.day_start_hour: Hour when day rate begins (0-23). Standard: 6 (06:00).
data_description.day_end_hour: Hour when day rate ends (0-23). Standard: 22 (22:00).
data_description.enable_subsidy: Apply Norwegian electricity subsidy (Strømstøtte). Government covers 90% of price above threshold.
data_description.subsidy_threshold: Price threshold for subsidy (NOK/kWh). Standard: 0.9375 NOK (93.75 øre/kWh).
data_description.subsidy_percentage: Percentage of excess price covered by government. Standard: 90%.
